db:abstract.db:para: A request for showing a context menu.
This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.4.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A ContextMenuRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::contextMenuRequested signal. It provides further information about the context of the request. The position of the request origin can be found via the x and y properties.
The accepted property of the request indicates whether the request is handled by the user code or the default context menu should be displayed.
The following code uses a custom menu to handle the request:

db:section.db:title: accepted : bool
db:section.db:para: Indicates whether the context menu request has been handled by the signal handler.
If the property is false after any signal handlers for WebEngineView::contextMenuRequested have been executed, a default context menu will be shown. To prevent this, set request.accepted to true.

db:note.db:para: The default content of the context menu depends on the web element for which the request was actually generated.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isContentEditable : bool
db:section.db:para: Indicates whether the selected web content is editable.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] linkText : string
db:section.db:para: The text of the link if the context menu was requested for a link.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] linkUrl : url
db:section.db:para: The URL of the link if the selected web page content is a link.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] mediaType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: The type of the media element or MediaTypeNone if the selected web page content is not a media element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] mediaUrl : url
db:section.db:para: The URL of media if the selected web content is a media element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] misspelledWord : string
db:section.db:para: If the context is a word considered misspelled by the spell-checker, returns the misspelled word.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] selectedText : string
db:section.db:para: The selected text the context menu was created for.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] spellCheckerSuggestions : stringlist
db:section.db:para: If the context is a word considered misspelled by the spell-checker, returns a list of suggested replacements.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] x : int
db:section.db:para: The x coordinate of the user action from where the context menu request originates.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] y : int
db:section.db:para: The y coordinate of the user action from where the context menu request originates.
